mapper.select: SELECT ft.id, ft.generation_id AS generationId, ft.submitted_at AS submittedAt, ft.created_at AS createdAt FROM finale_team ft WHERE DATE(ft.submitted_at) = #{targetDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO finale_project ( team_id, url, title, content, user_id, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{teamId}, #{url}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_DATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE finale_project SET url = #{url}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = CURRENT_DATE WHERE team_id = #{teamId} AND is_deleted = false
